your_birthday_information_is_private: Your birthday information is private and will not be shared on our mobile app.
the_password_should_contain_a_number: The password should contain at least a number
create_a_password_with_at_least_six_lett: Create a password with at least 06 letters or numbers. It should be something others can't easily guess.
it_should_have_at_least_six_characters: It should have at least 06 characters
this_field_should_be_equal_to_the_passwo: This field should be equal to the password
please_enter_the_same_password_again_to_: Please enter the same password again to confirm. This helps ensure that you have correctly remembered your password.
to_complete_your_account_setup_please_se: To complete your account setup, please select your user type. Your choice will determine the information you'll need to provide and the pages you'll see next.
your_account_is_almost_ready: Your account is almost ready! Once you finish the setup, you'll be able to explore our platform and start using its features.
if_you_cancel_the_account_setup_process_: If you cancel the account setup process, you will be logged out and unable to use the app. Are you sure you want to cancel ?
what_kind_of_user_are_you: What kind of user are you ?
proprio_details: As a Owner, you have full administrative control over your business.
proprio_tasks: You can manage employees, track inventory, and access detailed financial reports.
manager_details: As a Manager, you are responsible for the day-to-day operations of your shop.
manager_tasks: You can manage sales, process orders, and communicate with customers.
name: Name
the_website_of_your_shop: The website of your shop, if you have one
explore_all_the_possibilities_offered_by: Explore all the possibilities offered by our app. Start gaining efficiency today !
define_the_stock_alert_threshold_of_an_i: Define the stock alert threshold of an item
add_a_manager: Add a manager for your shop
total_items_present_in_your_shop: Total number of items in your shop
premium_pass_intro_text: Manage more than one shop, add more than one manager, get infinite items stock with the premium pass.
please_fill_in_the_item_details_below: Please fill in the item details below to add an item to your shop.
